main: ^John: Vigil, a terrible tragedy has occurred. My Keeper is dead, and my daughter is missing. I know this is a lot to ask, but I need your help.
^Keeper Vigil: John, I'm truly sorry to hear about what happened. You have served us well and I will help you as much as I can.
^John: Thank you, Vigil. I need to find my daughter, no matter what it takes. Can you help me with this?
^Keeper Vigil: Absolutely, I'll stand by your side. We'll search for her together, and I'll do everything in my power to assist you. Do you have any idea who did this?
^John: I have so many enemies because of my profession, I'd get tired of listing them.
^Keeper Vigil: Well, give me a minute to think about it, while you get your bearings and make yourself comfortable.
